ags:resource.dc:title: Destinations restructuring of machine-building enterprises for the production of equipment for the forest industry

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The article examines the organization of production of modern equipment for the forest industry in Russian mechanical engineering enterprises and produces high-quality forestry machinery. One of the proposed directions of the restructuring of production of the enterprise is expected to create divisions (business line) for production technology and production of cranes and other modern equipment for loading timber.
